name: Solid State Diver
description:
A 3rd person arena shooter where you dive each time you've defeated the enemies.

Created for Watch+Jam 3 in 2020

Toggle between keyboard and gamepad by hitting "C" key

Keyboard and mouse controls

  • Move - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse look
  • Jump - Space 
  • Dash - Shift
  • Shoot - Left mouse click

Gamepad 

  • Move - Left stick
  • Aim - Right stick
  • Jump - A button
  • Dash - Left trigger
  • Shoot - Right trigger
